All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AssetCategory
This class defines the data model of Asset Categories for persistence in a MongoDB.
AssetCategoryApiServices
This interface defines the services offered by the API layer pertaining to Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryApiServicesImpl
This class implements the services offered by the API layer pertaining to Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryController
This class intercepts API HTTP Requests pertaining to Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryConverters
This auxiliary interface defines transformations among MongoDb Asset Category database entities and data transfer objects.
AssetCategoryConvertersImpl
This auxiliary class performs transformations among MongoDb Asset Category database entities and data transfer objects.
AssetCategoryErrorMessages
This enumeration contains Response Codes to be used in Response Wrappers for Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryListener
This class automatically reports database transactions pertaining to Asset Categories (for MongoDB).
AssetCategoryMongoDaos
This class redirects enquires to the persistence layer pertaining to AssetCategories.
AssetCategoryMongoDbDao
This interface defines the entry points (Data Access Objects) to the services offered by Mongo databases pertaining to the persistence of Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryMongoDbDaoImpl
This class implements the entry points (Data Access Objects) to the services offered by Mongo databases pertaining to the persistence of Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryPersistenceLayerDaos
This interface defines the services offered by the persistence layer pertaining to Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryPersistenceServicesDao
This interface defines the services offered that pertain to persistence (CRUD) operations of AssetCategories.
AssetCategoryPersistenceServicesDaoImpl
This class redirects enquires to the persistence layer pertaining to AssetCategories.
AssetCategoryRepository
This class is the bridge between MongoDb and the Spring Framework application as far as Asset Category transactions are concerned.
AssetCategoryRequestDto
This class is a data transfer object representing Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryResponseDto
This class is a data transfer object representing Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryResponsesWrapper
This class wraps the responses travelling from the persistence layer back to the API for a more complete reporting of problems / unsuccessful requests on Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryResponseWrapper
This class wraps the responses travelling from the persistence layer back to the API for a more complete reporting of problems / unsuccessful requests on Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryServices
This interface defines the services offered by Mongo databases pertaining to the persistence of IoT AssetCategories.
AssetCategoryServicesImpl
This class implements the services offered by Mongo databases pertaining to the persistence of Asset Categories.
AssetCategoryValidator
This class implements methods to validate whether an incoming HTTP Request body contains attributes that are valid according to the business rules for an Asset Category entity.
AssetNature
This enumeration contains classifications of Assets (Asset Nature options).
CustomControllerAdvice
This controller intercepts generic API exceptions not caught by controllers corresponding to particular entities.
CustomMongoAutoConfiguration
This is a configuration class (concerns Mongo profile).
CustomMongoDataAutoConfiguration
This is a configuration class (concerns Mongo profile).
DateFormatter
This class offers the functionality of a global DateTime Formatter.
ErrorMessage
This class is a data transfer object representing an Error Message.
ErrorMessages
This enumeration contains identifiers of generic error codes addressed to API clients.
InitDB
 
JpaAuditingConfiguration
This is a configuration class (concerns JPA profiles).
KvAttribute
This class defines the data model of KvAttributes (in essence additional parameters describing Assets) for persistence in a MongoDB.
KvAttributeErrorMessages
This enumeration contains Response Codes to be used in Response Wrappers for KvAttributes.
KvAttributeRequestDto
This class is a data transfer object representing KvAttributes, in essence additional parameters describing.
KvAttributeResponseDto
This class is a data transfer object representing KvAttributes, in essence additional parameters describing Assets.
KvAttributeResponseWrapper
This class wraps the responses travelling from the persistence layer back to the API for a more complete reporting of problems / unsuccessful requests on KvAttributes.
KvAttributeValidator
This class implements methods to validate whether an incoming HTTP Request body contains attributes that are valid according to the business rules for a KvAttribute entity.
Location
This class defines the data model of Locations (Geographical or Virtual ones) for persistence in a MongoDB.
Location.GeoLocation
This inner class defines the data model of Geographical Locations for persistence in a MongoDB.
LocationConverters
This auxiliary interface defines transformations among MongoDb Location database entities and data transfer objects.
LocationConvertersImpl
This auxiliary class performs transformations among MongoDb Location database entities and data transfer objects.
LocationErrorMessages
This enumeration contains Response Codes to be used in Response Wrappers for Locations.
LocationRequestDto
This class is a data transfer object representing Locations (Geographical or Virtual ones).
LocationRequestDto.GeoLocationRequestDto
This inner class is a data transfer object for Geographical Locations.
LocationResponseDto
This class is a data transfer object representing Locations (Geographical or Virtual ones).
LocationResponseDto.GeoLocationResponseDto
This inner class is a data transfer object for Geographical Locations.
LocationResponseWrapper
This class wraps the responses travelling from the persistence layer back to the API for a more complete reporting of problems / unsuccessful requests on Locations.
LocationValidator
This class implements methods to validate whether an incoming HTTP Request body contains attributes that are valid according to the business rules for a Location entity.
ModelRepositoryServerApplication
This is the entrance point to the execution of the Spring Boot Project.
NonUuidArgumentException
This class defines an Exception to denote that a method's input parameter does not adhere as intended to the UUID format.
PaginationInfo
This class is auxiliary and contains pagination information to accompany lists returned in ResponseWrappers.
Parameter
This class defines the data model of Parameters for persistence in a MongoDB.
ParameterConverters

ParameterConvertersImpl
This auxiliary class performs transformations among MongoDb Parameter database entities and data transfer objects.

ParameterValueConvertersImpl

RelationshipType
This enumeration contains classifications of Relationships between Assets.
RequestDto
This class is a data transfer object used as body in incoming HTTP requests (POST and UPDATE).
ResponseCode
This enumeration contains Response Codes to be used in Response Wrappers.
ResponseWrapper
This class wraps the responses travelling from the persistence layer back to the API for a more complete reporting of problems / unsuccessful requests.
SuccessOrFailure
This enumeration contains a result indicator to be returned from functions denoting Success or Failure.
SwaggerConfig
This class contains configurations for the Swagger auto-generated documentation.
